attributes.action: Don’t make our summer holidays shorter, keep the term dates the same
attributes.additional_details: We’ve all been through so much this year if you keep us in school and take away our summer we get put under even more pressure and this could lead to mental health issues in teenagers and young adults getting really bad which is not a risk the government should ever be taking. But if the government takes away even a little bit of our summer we have less to look forward to because summer is in a way our reward for getting through these really difficult times.
attributes.background:
Keep the term dates the same
Let us keep all of our summer holidays

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574585
